issues.description: The UML diagram in the problem statement specifies getNameAndTotalNumberOfStudents() as returning void, but the task description and reference solution both require it to return a String. This return type mismatch could confuse students when writing the method signature.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the UML diagram in the problem statement so that getNameAndTotalNumberOfStudents() is shown as returning String instead of void, matching the task description and solution.
